data.enText: of or connected with the language group that includes Hebrew and Arabic
data.chText: 闪米特语族的，闪语的（包括希伯来语和阿拉伯语等）

data.enText: of or connected with the people who speak Semitic languages, especially Hebrew and Arabic
data.chText: 闪米特人（尤指操希伯来语和阿拉伯语的人）的；闪族的

means: 闪米特人(尤指操希伯来语和阿拉伯语的人)的
闪米特语族的，闪语的(包括希伯来语和阿拉伯语等)

value.def: Semitic languages are a group of languages that include Arabic and Hebrew.
value.tran: 闪米特语族的，闪语的(包括阿拉伯语和希伯来语)

value.def: Semitic people belong to one of the groups of people who speak a Semitic language.
Semitic is sometimes used to mean Jewish.
